files.patch: @@ -133,1 +133,1 @@ - * Constant for the left arrow key. + * Constant for the non-numpad left arrow key. @@ -138,1 +138,1 @@ - * Constant for the up arrow key. + * Constant for the non-numpad up arrow key. @@ -143,1 +143,1 @@ - * Constant for the right arrow key. + * Constant for the non-numpad right arrow key. @@ -148,1 +148,1 @@ - * Constant for the down arrow key. + * Constant for the non-numpad down arrow key. @@ -623,1 +623,1 @@ - * @deprecated Use {@link KeyCode#UP} instead. + * Constant for the numeric keypad up arrow key. @@ -625,1 +625,0 @@ - @Deprecated @@ -629,1 +628,1 @@ - * @deprecated Use {@link KeyCode#DOWN} instead. + * Constant for the numeric keypad down arrow key. @@ -631,1 +630,0 @@ - @Deprecated @@ -635,1 +633,1 @@ - * @deprecated Use {@link KeyCode#LEFT} instead. + * Constant for the numeric keypad left arrow key. @@ -637,1 +635,0 @@ - @Deprecated @@ -641,1 +638,1 @@ - * @deprecated Use {@link KeyCode#RIGHT} instead. + * Constant for the numeric keypad right arrow key. @@ -643,1 +640,0 @@ - @Deprecated
